Package org.ginsim.core.graph.backend

Class EdgeAttributeReaderImpl<V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.graph.backend.EdgeAttributeReaderImpl<V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vertex
    E - edge
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributesReader, EdgeAttributesReader<V,​E>
    public class EdgeAttributeReaderImpl<V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends Object
implements EdgeAttributesReader<V,​E>
    a generic edgeAttributeReader storing data into a dedicated hashmap
